description: This file is a PHP web page that provides MoCA Diagnostics for a network device. It includes scripts, HTML, and PHP code to display various network parameters, connected devices, and a network diagram, primarily for troubleshooting and diagnostic purposes.

methods.name: div_mod
methods.description: Utility function to compute the quotient and remainder when dividing $n by $m.

methods.name: ajax_moca_diagnostics
methods.description: Performs an AJAX request to fetch MoCA diagnostic data and updates the network diagram accordingly.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Draws the network diagram using the fetched MoCA data, using the vis.js library.

methods.name: update_NC_AssociatedDevices
methods.description: Updates the displayed list of associated MoCA devices with the latest data.

methods.name: moca_bonded_paths
methods.description: Determines the color code for a MoCA path based on its PHY transmit rate and supported version.

methods.name: create_nodes_edges
methods.description: Creates nodes and edges data structures for visualizing the MoCA network graph.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Destroys the current network visualization if it exists.
